definition.name: Automatic Pull Request
definition.description: Fix issues with AI-generated pull requests, powered by ChatGPT GPT-4 (AutoPR)

inputs.name: loading_gif_url
inputs.description: URL of the gif to display while the PR is being generated

inputs.name: model
inputs.description: Name of the OpenAI chat model

inputs.name: context_limit
inputs.description: Maximum size of the context window to use, varies depending on the model and preference

inputs.name: min_tokens
inputs.description: Minimum number of tokens to be made available for generation

inputs.name: max_tokens
inputs.description: Maximum number of tokens to generate

inputs.name: num_reasks
inputs.description: Number of times to re-ask the model in file exploration and commit generation

inputs.name: agent_id
inputs.description: ID of the brain to use

inputs.name: agent_config
inputs.description: Configuration for the coordinating agent in yaml format

inputs.name: target_branch_name_template
inputs.description: Template for the name of the target branch

inputs.name: overwrite_existing
inputs.description: Whether to overwrite existing branches and pull requests when creating from issues

evidence.reasoning: The action automates the creation of pull requests to fix issues, which directly relates to code quality. It also involves communication through the generation of pull requests and potentially notifying users of changes.
